text: The 1990–91 VfL Bochum season was the 53rd season in club history. ==Review and events== On 22 April 1991 head coach Reinhard Saftig was sacked and replaced by caretaker Rolf Schafstall. ==Matches== ===Legend=== ===Bundesliga=== ===DFB-Pokal=== ===Intertoto Cup=== ==Squad== ===Squad and statistics=== ====Squad, appearances and goals scored==== ===Transfers=== ====Summer==== In: Out: ==Sources== ==External links== * 1990–91 VfL Bochum season at Weltfussball.de * 1990–91 VfL Bochum season at kicker.de * 1990–91 VfL Bochum season at Fussballdaten.de Bochum Category:VfL Bochum seasons
title: 1990–91 VfL Bochum season
